projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

div.l: akṛtajñatvalobhābhyāṃ nārthān punar avāpsyasi || RATNA_04.07
div.p: iha pathy adanaṃ loke na vahaty abhṛto bhṛtaḥ |
div.l: yācakas tv abhṛto 'mutra hīnaḥ śataguṇadvahaḥ || RATNA_04.08
udārakarmaṇaḥ sarvam udāraṃ jāyate phalam || RATNA_04.09
kuru dharmāspadaṃ śrīmat khyātaṃ ratnatrayāspadam || RATNA_04.10
mṛtyasyāpy apraśasyatvād rājaṃs tad akṛtaṃ varam || RATNA_04.11
utsāhaghnaṃ ca mandānāṃ sarvasvenāpi kāraya || RATNA_04.12
dharme niyuktaṃ yāty eva purastāt sarvam eva tat || RATNA_04.13
kiṃ pūrvakasya dharmāya sukhāya yaśase 'pi vā || RATNA_04.14
div.p: bhuktād arthād iha sukhaṃ dattāt pāratrikaṃ sukham |
div.l: abhuktādattanaṣṭatvād duḥkham eva kutaḥ sukhaṃ || RATNA_04.15
div.p: vinaśyan sacivair dātum asvātantryān na śakyasi |
div.l: āpatichedaniḥsnehair navarājapriyaiṣibhiḥ || RATNA_04.16
div.p: sarvasvenāpy ataḥ svasthaḥ śīghraṃ dharmāspadaṃ kuru |
div.l: mṛtyupratyayamadhyasthaḥ pravātasthapradīpavat || RATNA_04.17
devadroṇyādayas te 'pi pravartyantāṃ yathā sthitāḥ || RATNA_04.18
sarvakṣamair akalahair bhajyeraṃs taiḥ sado(dya)taiḥ || RATNA_04.19
te 'py annapānaṃ sāmyena labherann avighaṭṭitāḥ || RATNA_04.20
apy anyarājyasaṃsthānām anurūpān pravarttaya || RATNA_04.21
alubdhaṃ paṇḍitaṃ dharmyaṃ kuru teṣām abādhakaṃ || RATNA_04.22
div.p: nītijñān dhārmikān snigdhān śucīn bhaktān akātarān |
kulinān śīlasampannān [ 16a ] kṛtajñān sacivān kuru || RATNA_04.23
akṣudrāṃs tyāginaḥ śūrān snigdhān sambhoginaḥ sthirān |
div.l: kuru nityāpramattāṃs ca dhārmikān daṇḍanāyakān || RATNA_04.24
kṛtavṛttīn samān snigdhān vṛddhān adhikṛtan kuru || RATNA_04.25
div.p: pratimāsaṃ ca tebhyas tvaṃ sarvam āyavyayaṃ śṛṇu |
div.l: śrutvā dharmādhikārādyaṃ kāryaṃ sarvaṃ svayaṃ vada || RATNA_04.26
div.p: dharmārthaṃ yadi te rājyaṃ na kīrtyarthaṃ na kāmataḥ |
div.l: tataḥ saphalam atyartham anarthārtham ato 'nyathā || RATNA_04.27
yathā rājyaṃ ca dharmaś ca bhavet tava tathā śṛṇu || RATNA_04.28
sametā bahavo nityaṃ santu te kāryadarśinaḥ || RATNA_04.29
kārunyārdraḥ sadā bhūtvā tvam anugrahavān bhava || RATNA_04.30
kāruṇyāt satataṃ rājaṃs tīvrapāpakṛtām api || RATNA_04.31
ta eva hi kṛpāsthānam hatāmāno mahātmanām || RATNA_04.32
div.p: pratyahaṃ pañcarātram vā baddhān kṣīnān vimocaya |
div.l: śeṣān api yathāyogaṃ mā kāṃścit naiva mocaya || RATNA_04.33
div.p: yeṣv amokṣaṇacittaṃ te jāyate teṣv asaṃvaraḥ |
div.l: tasmād asaṃvarāt pāpam ajasram upacīyate || RATNA_04.34
div.p: [ 16b ] yāvac ca na vimucyeraṃs tāvat syuḥ sukhabandhanāḥ |
div.l: nāpitasnānapānānnabhaiṣajyavasanānvitāḥ || RATNA_04.35
kāruṇy [ āt tāḍanam kāryaṃ na dveṣān ] nārthalipsayā || RATNA_04.36
div.p: vimṛśya saṃyag vijñāya praduṣṭān ghātakān api |
div.l: ahatvā 'pīḍayitvā ca kuru nirviṣayān narān || RATNA_04.37
div.p: svatantraḥ paśya sarvaṃ ca viṣayaṃ cāracakṣuṣā |
div.l: nityāpramattaḥ smṛtimān kuru kāryaṃ ca dhārmikaṃ || RATNA_04.38
udārair anurūpais tu śeṣān api yathāvidhi || RATNA_04.39
rājavṛkṣaḥ kṣamācchāyaḥ sevyate bhṛtyaprakṣibhiḥ || RATNA_04.40
śarkarāmodako yadvad elāmaricakarkaśaḥ || RATNA_04.41
div.p: mātsyanyāyaś ca te naivaṃ nyāyād rājyaṃ bhaviṣyati |
div.l: na cānyāyo na vā 'dharmo dharmaś caivaṃ bhaviṣyati || RATNA_04.42
div.p: paralokāt tvayā rājyaṃ nānītaṃ nāpi neṣyasi |
div.l: dharmāt prāptam ato 'syārthe nādharmaṃ kartum arhasi || RATNA_04.43
rājan yathā nārjayasi prayatnaḥ kriyatāṃ tathā || RATNA_04.44
rājan yathā nirviśasi prayatnaḥ kriyatāṃ tathā || RATNA_04.45
śārīraṃ mānasaṃ caiva sukhadvayam idaṃ matam || RATNA_04.46
saṃjñāmayaṃ mānasaṃ tu kevalaṃ kaplpanākṛtaṃ || RATNA_04.47
lokasya sukhasarvasvaṃ vyartham etad ato 'rthataḥ || RATNA_04.48
śayyā 'nnapānahastyastyaśvastrīṇāṃ caikaikabhogyatā || RATNA_04.49
div.p: yadā ca yatra cittaṃ syāt tadānena sukhaṃ kila |
div.l: śeṣāṇām amanaskārāt teṣāṃ vyarthatvam arthataḥ || RATNA_04.50
na kalpayati yed gṛhṇan nāsmāt teṣu tadā sukhaṃ || RATNA_04.51
div.p: jānīte viṣayaṃ yaṃ yaṃ yena yenendriyeṇa ca |
div.l: tadā na śeṣaiḥ śeṣāṇi vyarthāny eva yatas tadā || RATNA_04.52
upalabhya vyatītasya kalpayan manyate sukhaṃ || RATNA_04.53
div.p: ekam arthaṃ vijānāti yady apy ekam ihendriyaṃ |
div.l: tad apy arthaṃ vinā vyarthaṃ vyartho 'rtho 'pi ca tad vinā || RATNA_04.54
cakṣūrūpe pratītyaivam ukto vijñānasaṃbhavah || RATNA_04.55
taddvayānatiriktatvād vyarthā ye 'pi ca sāmpratāḥ || RATNA_04.56

lg.l: tathendriyāṇi [ 17b ] gṛhṇanti viṣayān sāmpratān iva || RATNA_04.57

div.l: pratisvaṃ bhūtavaiyarthyād eṣāṃ vyarthatvam arthataḥ || RATNA_04.58
saṃparke lakṣaṇābhāvaḥ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa nirṇayaḥ || RATNA_04.59
div.p: evaṃ dvidhāpi bhūtānāṃ vyarthatvāt saṅgatir vṛthā |
div.l: vyarthatvāt saṅgateś caivaṃ rūpaṃ vyartham ato 'rthataḥ || RATNA_04.60
pratyekam ātmavaiyarthyād vaiyarthyaṃ paramārthataḥ || RATNA_04.61
tathā duhkhābhimāno 'pi sukhasya pratighātajaḥ || RATNA_04.62
duḥkhe viyogatṛṣṇā ca paśyatāṃ muktir ity ataḥ || RATNA_04.63
div.p: kaḥ paśyatīti cec cittaṃ vyavahāreṇa kathyate |
div.l: na hi caittaṃ vinā cittaṃ vyarthatvān na saheṣyate || RATNA_04.64
div.p: vyartham evaṃ jagan matvā yāthābhūtyān nirāspadaḥ |
div.l: nirvāti nirupādāno nirupādānavahnivat || RATNA_04.65
kevalaṃ tv asya kāruṇyād ābodher bhavasaṃtatiḥ || RATNA_04.66
nirdiṣṭaḥ sa tu sammūḍhaiḥ pradviṣṭaiś caiva nindyate || RATNA_04.67
athavāpi guṇadveṣī mahāyānasya nindakaḥ || RATNA_04.68
jñātvocyate guṇadveṣī mahāyānasya nindakaḥ || RATNA_04.69
guṇākaraṃ mahāyānaṃ tad dveṣī tena dahyate || RATNA_04.70
śrāddho 'pi dagdha ity uktaḥ kā cintā dveṣabandhure || RATNA_04.71
duḥkhenāpy ahitaṃ hanyād ity ukte kiṃ virudhyate || RATNA_04.72
hitaṃ hitamanāḥ kurvan duḥkenāpy ahitaṃ kathaṃ || RATNA_04.73
div.p: duḥkham apy āyatīpathyaṃ kāryaṃ kimu sukhaṃ hitaṃ |
div.l: ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ || RATNA_04.74
tyajen mātrāsukhaṃ dhīraḥ saṃpaśyan vipulaṃ sukhaṃ || RATNA_04.75
div.p: na mṛṣyate ca yady etat kaṭubhaiṣajyadāyinaḥ |
div.l: tataś cikitsakādyāś ca hatā naivaṃ ca yujyate || RATNA_04.76
div.p: apathyam api yad dṛṣṭaṃ tat pathyaṃ paṇḍitaiḥ kvacit |
div.l: utsargaś cāpavādaś ca sarvaśāstreṣu śaṃsyate || RATNA_04.77
uktā yatra mahāyāne kas tan nindet sacetanaḥ || RATNA_04.78
nindyate 'dya mahāyānaṃ mohāt svaparavairibhiḥ || RATNA_04.79
mahāyānam atas tasmin kasmād durbhāṣitaṃ vacaḥ || RATNA_04.80
dhyānaṃ prajñā ca mokṣāya mahāyānārthasaṃgrahaḥ || RATNA_04.81
te saṭpāramitāgarbhās tasmād bauddham idaṃ vacaḥ || RATNA_04.82
deśitas tan mahāyānam ajñānād vai na dṛśyate || RATNA_04.83
mahāyāne yato buddhamāhātmyaṃ kṣamyatām idam || RATNA_04.84
yasmāt tad buddhamāhātmyam acintyaṃ kiṃ na mṛṣyate || RATNA_04.85
kṣayānutpādāyoś caikyam arthataḥ kṣamyatāṃ yataḥ || RATNA_04.86
mahāyānetaroktāni na sameyuḥ kathaṃ satāṃ || RATNA_04.87
ekayānatriyānoktād ātmā rakṣya upekṣayā || RATNA_04.88
div.p: upekṣayā hi nāpuṇyam dveṣāt pāpaṃ kutaḥ śubhaṃ |
div.l: mahāyāne yato dveṣo nātmakāmaiḥ kṛto 'rhati || RATNA_04.89
uktāḥ śrāvakayāne 'smād bodhisattvaḥ kutas tataḥ || RATNA_04.90
buddhair anyat pramāṇaṃ ca ko 'smin arthe jinādhikaḥ || RATNA_04.91
mārgāc chrāvakasāmānyād bauddhaṃ kenādhikaṃ phalaṃ || RATNA_04.92
bhāṣitaṃ ca mahāyāne grāhyam asmād vicakṣaṇaiḥ || RATNA_04.93
buddho 'vadat tathā dharmaṃ vineyānāṃ yathākṣamaṃ || RATNA_04.94
keṣāṃcit puṇyasiddhyarthaṃ keṣāṃcid dvayaniḥśritaṃ || RATNA_04.95
śūnyatākaruṇāgarbham ekeṣāṃ bodhisādhanaṃ || RATNA_04.96
prasādaś cādhikaḥ kāryaḥ saṃyaksaṃbodhisiddhaye || RATNA_04.97
prāpyate 'nuttarā bodhiḥ sarvasaukhyāni cāntarā || RATNA_04.98
dharma uktaḥ kṛpāgarbhaḥ sa sātmīkriyatāṃ dṛḍhaṃ || RATNA_04.99
div.p: atha lokasya vaidharmyād rājyaṃ dharmeṇa duṣkaraṃ |
div.l: tato dharmayaśo 'rthaṃ te prayujyādhigamaḥ kṣamaḥ || RATNA_04.100
